Transports
[eProsima RPCDDS API Reference]

Network transports that eProsima RPCDDS library offers. These transports define how a connection is established between a proxy and a server. More...

 This class represents a remote endpoint used by a proxy. Also this class encapsulate the DDS datawriter and the DDS datareader. More...

 This class represents a asynchronous task created to wait the reply from the server in an asynchronous call. More...

 This class is the base of all proxies that implement a transport using DDS. More...
class  eprosima::rpc::transport::dds::ServerTransport
 This class is the base of all classes that implement a transport using DDS. This transport can be used by the servers. More...
class  eprosima::rpc::transport::dds::TCPProxyTransport
 This class implements a transport using DDS over TCPv4. This transport can only be used by a server proxy. More...
class  eprosima::rpc::transport::dds::TCPServerTransport
 This class implements a transport using DDS over TCPv4. This transport can only be used by a server. More...
class  eprosima::rpc::transport::dds::Transport
 This class is the base of all classes that implement a transport using DDS. This transport could be used by both proxies and servers. More...
class  eprosima::rpc::transport::dds::UDPProxyTransport
 This class implements a transport using DDS over UDPv4. This transport only can be used by a server's proxy. More...
class  eprosima::rpc::transport::dds::UDPServerTransport
 This class implements transport using DDS over UDPv4. This transport can only be used by a server. More...
class  eprosima::rpc::transport::ProxyTransport
 This interface is the base of all classes that implement a transport that can be used by the proxy. More...
class  eprosima::rpc::transport::ServerTransport
 This interface is the base of all classes that implement a transport that can be used by the server. More...
class  eprosima::rpc::transport::Transport
 This class is the base of all classes that implement a transport that could be used by the proxy or the server. More...

 This enumeration specifies the behaviour of the transport.

Enumerations

enum  eprosima::rpc::transport::TransportBehaviour { PROXY_BEHAVIOUR, SERVER_BEHAVIOUR }
 

This enumeration specifies the behaviour of the transport.


Detailed Description

Network transports that eProsima RPCDDS library offers. These transports define how a connection is established between a proxy and a server.

Generated on 29 Aug 2014 for eProsima RPCDDS C++ API by  1.6.1
